scripts.copy:vendor: cpy --flat node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js vendor/ && cpy --flat node_modules/datatables.net-dt/js/dataTables.dataTables.min.js vendor/ && cpy --flat node_modules/datatables.net-dt/css/dataTables.dataTables.min.css vendor/
scripts.build: npm run copy:vendor && npm run copy:polyfills && rollup -c
